title: 04/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
After another huge night from Steph Curry, Colin explains why he hasn’t been impressed with the offensive outbursts we’ve seen around the NBA. He discusses the career of one young quarterback in the NFL and why the more we see of him, the less we like. He also shares his controversial list of top 5 NBA MVP candidates. Plus, Florida head coach Dan Mullen joins the show to talk about his experience coaching Kyle Pitts and Dak Prescott.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
